title: Handle Polar Bear Meat Safely
brief: Process polar bear meat safely while avoiding toxic liver and dangerous hunting situations.
steps: Step 1: If hunting polar bear, aim for brain - bullets elsewhere rarely kill them.
Step 2: Always cook polar bear meat thoroughly before eating.
Step 3: Remove and discard liver immediately - never eat polar bear liver.
Step 4: Process meat while still warm if possible.
warnings: Polar bears are extremely dangerous - most dangerous of all bears with tireless hunting ability, good sight, and extraordinary sense of smell.
Polar bear liver contains toxic concentration of vitamin A that can be fatal.
Avoid polar bears whenever possible - approach only if absolutely necessary for survival.
Where there are seals, there are usually polar bears - they have stalked and killed seal hunters.
